## Transaction.applyGuardianSignature() method

Applies the guardian signature on the transaction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
applyGuardianSignature(guardianSignature: ISignature | Uint8Array): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  guardianSignature | [ISignature](./sdk-core.isignature.md) \| Uint8Array | The signature, as computed by a signer. |

**Returns:**

void
